bibl.title: The Xenophon Papyri. Anabasis, Cyropaedia, Cynegeticus, De vectigalibus.
bibl.seg: Paap A.H.R.E., The Xenophon Papyri. Anabasis, Cyropaedia, Cynegeticus, De vectigalibus. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XVIII.)

C.R. par Christian Devos, ChrEg 45 (1970) No. 90, pp. 400-401. - Bruce E. Donovan, AJP 94 (1973) pp. 225-227. - Ursula Hagedorn, Gnomon 45 (1973) pp. 645-649. - Juan Pegueroles, StPap 10 (1971) p. 133. - Alfred Tomsin, RBPh 50 (1972) pp. 186-187. - Eric G. Turner, CR N.S., 23 (1973) pp. 144-145. - Alfons Wouters, Mnemosyne 4e s., 27 (1974) pp. 85-87.
